remarks: The set of all elements less than a given element has an LUB. (Contributed by NM, 8-Sep-2018.)
statement:
lublecl.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lublecl.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lublecl.u $e |- U = ( lub ` K ) $.
lublecl.k $e |- ( ph -> K e. Poset ) $.
lublecl.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
lublecl $p |- ( ph -> { y e. B | y .<_ X } e. dom U ) $.
$d .<_ y $.
$d B y $.
$d X y $.
